column1: Jack is in the kitchen in his house. Jack wants a cold drink from the refrigerator. The refrigerator is full of fresh food. Jack thinks the refrigerator is full of fresh food. A bird flies into the kitchen through the open window. Jack opens the refrigerator to get a cold drink.

Caden is in his new house. Caden wants to fix all the things that are not right. There is a big leak in the roof. Caden thinks there is a big leak in the roof. A bird lands on the roof. Caden plans to call a man to fix the leak.

Vivi is in her room playing with her toys. Vivi wants to lay her small, patient triangle toy on the shelf with her other toys. The triangle toy is in her toy box. Vivi believes the triangle toy is in her toy box. A bird flies into the room through the open window. Vivi lays the triangle toy on the shelf.

Wally is sitting in his room after a long day. Wally wants to draw a calm picture with his pastels. The pastels are in a big box. Wally thinks the pastels are in the big box. The room starts to glow with a soft light from the setting sun. Wally opens the box to take out the pastels.

Emma is in her room after a long day at school. Emma wants to draw on her white bathrobe to make it look creative. The bathrobe is plain and white. Emma believes the bathrobe is plain and white. A cat walks into Emma's room. Emma plans to start drawing on her bathrobe.

Ollie is at the beach building a sand castle. Ollie wants to dig a deep hole with his spade. The spade is sharp and safe to use. Ollie thinks the spade is sharp and safe to use. A seagull lands near Ollie's sand castle. Ollie continues to dig the hole with the spade.

Ben is at the train station. Ben wants to catch the train to go to work. The train is on time. Ben believes the train is on time. A crazy dog runs across the train tracks. Ben plans to get on the train and start working on his case.

Pia is at her school library. Pia wants to read a mystery book. The mystery book is on the top shelf. Pia thinks the mystery book is on the top shelf. A cat sneaks into the library. Pia plans to ask for help to reach the top shelf.

Chloe is at a fair in her town. Chloe wants to hug the fireman at the fair. The fireman is very friendly. Chloe thinks the fireman is very friendly. A clown starts making balloon animals at the fair. Chloe walks up to the fireman to give him a hug.

Wendy is at a yard sale in her town. Wendy wants to buy a beautiful bracelet she saw. The bracelet is shiny and cheap. Wendy believes the bracelet is shiny and cheap. A dog runs through the yard sale, knocking over a table. Wendy plans to buy the bracelet.
